page.title: 11MADELEY STAFFS : LADIES ONLY
page.content: There are 3 organisations specifically for women,which provide opportunities to meet like-minded women,whether their interests are religious,intellectual or topical & general.The Mothers' Union-an Anglican Church group-has approximately 35 members who meet each month to hear a speaker on a religious topic.15 of them form a discussion group. The National Housewives'Register is more widely based & more general in appeal but now has only 12 members, mostly young.They have a varied programme including outings,but usually meet in a member's home for discussions food or fun evenings,or lectures. The Women's Institute is a national body which aims to educate,& improve the life of,country women every where. Established 40 years ago,Madeley Institute attracts about 40 established villagers & newcomers to its meetings.
